content: this is a simple roomy and very cute pullover for baby knitted bottom-up in the round with a bonus - no purling and no seams **errata for the previous version amended 4/12/10 ** 1 page 2 in the section on knitting the body should contain a reminder to slip 6 stitches of the body to a holder before attaching the 2nd sleeve same process as the first sleeve 2 the loose-edged bind-off uses a yarnover instead of a make 1 for greater ease in the neckline
